caseStudies.title: Guiding the Product Vision and Roadmap
caseStudies.subtitle: UX Design & Strategy for an Interactive Webinar Platform

overview.summary: I joined a startup focused on building an interactive webinar platform. In a fast-moving, cross-functional team, I helped shape the product vision and roadmap while ensuring that design decisions aligned with both user needs and business goals.
keyPoints: Led user research to identify key pain points in the webinar experience
Developed user personas and journey maps to guide feature prioritization
Created wireframes and prototypes for new features
Collaborated with developers to ensure feasible implementation

challenge.problem: The product had grown rapidly to meet early market demands, but as the team looked to the future, it became clear that a more unified product direction was needed. During my early conversations with the four original team members, I realized each of them had a slightly different vision for where the product should go. This diversity of perspectives—while valuable—created a need for alignment. The challenge became to support the team in clarifying a shared long-term vision and translating that into a tangible, user-centered roadmap within a fast-paced, agile environment.
goals: Clarify and align the long-term product vision
Translate team insights into actionable design directions
Improve the user journey for webinar hosts and participants
Use design as a tool to support prioritization and collaboration
